casebody.data:
Cartwright
v.
Akron Gen. Med. Ctr. 2018-0567 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 5, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Appellant's motion for stay denied and motion to withdraw denied.

O'Connor, C.J. and Fischer and DeWine, J., would grant the motion to withdraw as counsel.
